item.title: I do development for one week and marketing and documentation for one week
item.description: I know the advice is to find a co-founder. But what if you canâ€™t find a co-founder? Yes, having a co-founder is great. But there are companies that are founded by solo-founders who went on to become billion or million dollar companies.
